title: The Renegades
description: "Are you brave enough? Are you strong enough?"–to embark on this intricate journey full of elaborate history, unforeseen love, and pathways of perils. This very book is your ticket to Oceanside City, where you are guaranteed to run across fourteen-year-old Makai. Born of forbidden love, he is the son of legendary warrior Richard Sanders. Makai's grandfather has kept his mysterious origin a secret most of his life. Determined to save his grandson from the unfortunate fate that has plagued their family for generations, Elder Cecil searches for help. And who better to come to his aid than Lady Karah–a twenty-two-year-old swordmaster able to communicate with wolves–and her sister Lady Ashleigh, an archeress accompanied by her sassy falcon JJ. Together, they will embark on a civil rights mission that will change the course of history not only for Makai but for Oceanside City and all people in between.
author: Na'Imah Anderson
